# Typeface

```tsx
body1: {
  fontSize: 16,
  fontWeight: <const> '400',
  letterSpacing: 0,
  lineHeight: 24,
  color: Colors.black,
},
body2: {
  fontSize: 14,
  fontWeight: <const> '400',
  letterSpacing: 0,
  lineHeight: 20,
  color: Colors.black,
},
body3: {
  fontSize: 12,
  fontWeight: <const> '400',
  letterSpacing: 0,
  lineHeight: 18,
  color: Colors.black,
}
```
